text: (pasudā) udǣsana ema nagarayehi (taman gæna kumak sidu vannēdæyi) biya gænvūveku vaśayen avadhānaya karamin siṭi avasthāvēdī īyē dina udav illā siṭi aya (nævatat tamanṭa udav karana men) kǣ gasā mohuva ārādhanā kaḷēya. eyaṭa mūsā ohuṭa “oba prakaṭa kaḷahakārayeku vaśayen siṭinnehiya” yayi (avamānayen yutuva) pævasuvēya
